author: staszek.wasiutynski
title: On-Chain Trust
description: Lack of liquidity in real-world investment properties. Buying, selling and managing them is a struggle.
solution: Standardized property management on the Cardano. Buy and sell property as equity tokens on Cardano.
experience: I've been working for 10 years as software developer. Last 2.5 years as a full stack developer in a big corp. Plutus pioneer program member.
